name: Let me heal you
description:
I tried to follow the gamejam theme (It's interesting theme), and got this weird idea where it's a shump game, but with ally system that you can heal them to join you.

The game was supposed to be better than this, unfortunately got sick in midway (6 days).

I hope you enjoy it.

Credits:-

  • Mikado: Developer and art.
  • Erie: Developer.
  • EienNoBeginner: BGM.
  • SFBDim:ChipTone to make sounds.
  • Flob Designs: Fonts.
  • Godot: Good game engine.
